data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Okamoto, Makoto, Gon, Ofer (2018): A review of the deepwater cardinalfish genus Epigonus (Perciformes: Epigonidae) of the Western Indian Ocean, with description of two new species. Zootaxa 4382 (2): 261-291, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4382.2.3|38 occurrences
